channel.title: Web-Site help, No Noobs please
channel.description:
Hello, If you are experienced With Making Web-Sites I need your help
I have bought Hosting from Hostgator, and am trying to Set up a Web-Site.. I'll give you Cpanel Information
I just need someone that knows the basics & Can great a good Clean Looking Home-Page with forums and some features.
Me and My friend are Working On Starting a Server With Hopefully a web-client in the future, I need someone that Can Give us a good clean Home-page & SMF 1.1.5 Forums The position Will be admin on the server & Forum Administraitor
So please contact me on: owner-sparkz@hotmail.com I am currently watching a football match On tv, so if I dont reply please wait around
And please I mean please!, Dont add me if your a noob.
there may be a reward Or $ If you have paypal & Can do the job!
Thanks - Sparkz!
May The new players - Burn in hell :P
